{"step_by_step_thinking": "Acanthosis refers to the thickening of the skin. According to the provided documents, acanthosis nigricans is characterized by hyperkeratosis, epidermal folding, leukocyte infiltration, and melanocyte proliferation. This suggests an increase in thickness of the superficial layer of the skin (epidermis). Therefore, the correct answer is B. Increase in thickness of superficial layer.", "answer_choice": "B"}
